sentence.text: In humans, negative regulation of cell proliferation is the gene responsible for the disease neurofibromatosis muscle organ development II, which results in the development of brain tumors, including acoustic neurinoma and meningioma.

It was hypothesized that the whorl formation of meningiomas may occur as a result of a disturbance in the planar cell polarity (biological_process) of arachnoid cells, thus, genes understood to govern PCP signaling were analyzed for alterations.
